review: This is a great product. Many apps to add and so easy to use- this is highly recommended
author: YENVAN

review: I love my Amazon Fire so I thought I would try the stick for our second TV. Unfortunately, the sound only worked with non-Dolby programming of which there is not much. Tried it on the other television, same problem no matter which audio setting I tried on the stick and the televisions. Pretty disappointing. Returned it....
author: Knox Filmmaker "Director, War & Truth"

review: I love the convenience of this.
author: Elvira

review: Works as advertised. Installation is fast and easy. With Prime everything is set for free viewing movies, TV series, Showtime Anytime, etc. I am going to purchase another one for a second TV in the house.
author: D. Wile

review: I love my fire stick! The apps that are free are awesome. I am very happy with the easy set up too!
author: Debbie Cluckey

review: So far, so good. It does everything I ask it to do.
author: John Lewis

review: I love it! we were using our old playstation to watch hulu netflix n amazon instant. Our fan was getting loud in the playstation it was dying on us and didnt really want to spend so much money on an apple tv so $40 very well spent! easy to use and install . We just love it !
author: Sylvia Truc Trinh

review: We love the fire stick. I'm also a prime member and there is a lot of free things to watch, and music is great.
author: Edie
